newsitem.title: UK: Hampson says has 80.95 pct in Arabis.
newsitem.headline: Hampson says has 80.95 pct in Arabis.

text.p: British engineering firm Hampson Industries Plc said on Monday it had acquired shares and valid acceptances covering 80.95 percent of shareholding of Arabis Plc with regard to its offer for its entire share capital.
Hampson said it had valid acceptances from holders of 54.06 million shares as on February 21, 1997, representing 71.26 percent Arabis' share capital.
Hampson had earlier acquired 7.36 million shares during the offer period.
The ordinary offer has now become unconditional in all respects, Hampson said.
Hampson said it had received valid acceptances in respect of 100,828 Arabis preference shares representing 27.70 percent of its preference share capital.
Hampson had made an all-share recommended offer for Arabis on January 29, valuing the engineering firm at around 17.5 million stg and 22.5 pence per share.
